requirement.title: Skin response measurements
requirement.summary: Skin can be used to obtain multiple types of measurements
requirement.extract: So you can measure all kinds of clever things. You can measure skin conductance and startle responses.

requirement.title: Visual response measurements
requirement.summary: Vision & eye movement can be used to obtain multiple types of measurements
requirement.extract: Vision and eye movements are key indicators of cognitive processing.

requirement.title: Vocal tone measurements
requirement.summary: The quality and level of vocal projection are indicative of physical responses related to cognitive interactions
requirement.extract: Speech therapists evaluate the pitch & volume of spoken sentences to evaluate the amount of oxygen a patient is using to speak

requirement.title: Writing pattern evaluation
requirement.summary: Writing patterns can be utilized to evaluate stress patterns
requirement.extract: I was able to tell that my writing was a bit off. I was writing so fast that when I looked back at what I had written I wasn't able to read it myself
